other_tests.findings: LPL activity was reduced by 76% and LPL mass was reduced by 50% compared with normolipidemic controls.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At times of better compliance, plasma triglycerides showed fluctuations ranging from 696 mg/dl to 2400 mg/dl.

other_tests.findings: The proband was found to be homozygous for a G/H11022A substitution in exon 9 of LMF1 gene (W464X).
The mutation W464X significantly reduced the activity of Lmf1.
